recipes.title: Pizza
recipes.method: Pre-heat the oven to 240C. In a bowl, add your ingredients and combine. Kneed for about 10 minutes until a smooth dough ball is formed. Leave to rise for about 4 hours. Shape your dough into a pizza shape, add tomato sauce and cheese and cook for about 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Scrambled Eggs
recipes.method: In a bow whisk 4 eggs. Add a pinch of salt and pepper. In a frying pan, add cooking oil, let it heat for about 1 minute, and then add the whisked eggs. Stir the eggs until cooked.
